comments.body: Sorry if I am confused, but does this mean we do not start searching in the `node_modules` subfolder of the current folder, but in the `node_modules` subfolder of the parent folder right away?

Because `parentURL` is a file path, the parent folder URL does the direct parent `node_modules` check.

We could possibly clarify this by calling it `parentDirURL`.
I actually just refactored the wording of the resolution to get this one right.
